评论概述: Wanted to love it, but problems, return issues
评论详情: I bought the dark blue option, and when I opened the package I LOVED it. The color was better than expected. But things changed once I opened it and tried it on.  Not only was it several inches shorter than the exact same top/sweater I’ve bought in different prints from this company, it had a huge hole/split in one of the seams. The seam was stitched so close to the edge, it was impossible for me to repair, so it was returned. Sad face #1.  I would have chosen “replace with exact same item”, and have it another chance, but that option wasn’t offered. Sad face #2.  The return was free, but not as easy as one expects on Amazon these days. One, I had to print USPS labels (I don’t have a printer at home or have access to one at work). I also had to repack and tape it up myself (had to buy tape) - for a defective product (they should’ve handled it). Sad face #3.  In addition, my return never registered on Amazon (it kept directing me to print my return label, after I’d mailed it). I had to message the seller for my refund with proof of the return being delivered to them (tracking was clear), 6 days after they received it. My refund did then show up quickly, but prompting shouldn’t be necessary. Sad face #4.  What a headache. I really wish it would’ve been the same size and quality I’ve learned to expect from this item and brand over the years.

评论详情: The image shows a model that must be >5 feet tall.  I am 5'9 and the sweater hit across my hip line, which is fine, but not expected.  I got loads of compliments on it.  The sleeves are gathered like the top of a tube sock.  I didn't mind that at all, but if you are sensitive to things like that, beware.  I have freshened it in the dryer with a dryer sheet as I am a little concerned about how well it will maintain its color and shape after washing.  All told, I will probably buy another style from this line.  They just should be a little more truthful in the pictures online.

I have now ordered 3 sweaters from Ellazhu and I have my eye on a few more... How many do I really need?? But I love the designs. Being tall at 5'10", I do wish they were a little longer as they don't look as stylishly oversized on me, but I love the colors and playfulness of the designs. I'd love to see more abstract-ish one in spring colors... please? They're easy to care for - I use the washer and hang to dry, though they could probably go through the dryer just fine, I'm trying to avoid *any* shrinkage.  The fabric is lovely and soft, and feels so cozy when it's a bit chilly, and the tighter sleeves make it easy to wear a coat or layer another sweater if needed. The design is printed onto the fabric. And I get compliments on them all the time - especially the "Taxi" one :)
